attributes.text:
EXPERIMENTAL – NOT READY FOR PRODUCTION

Base class for all list item renderer.
new value of the property
previous value of the property (null if it was not yet set).

Applies changes of the property value of the property selected.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.
new value of the property
previous value of the property (null if it was not yet set).

Applies changes of the property value of the property showArrow.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.

Returns the (computed) value of the property selectable.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectable}.
(Computed) value of selectable.

Returns the (computed) value of the property selected.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.
(Computed) value of selected.

Returns the (computed) value of the property showArrow.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.
(Computed) value of showArrow.
Initial value for property selectable.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property selectable with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectable}.
the default value
Initial value for property selected.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property selected with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.
the default value
Initial value for property showArrow.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property showArrow with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.
the default value

Check whether the (computed) value of the boolean property selectable equals true.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectable}.
Whether the property equals true.

Check whether the (computed) value of the boolean property selected equals true.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.
Whether the property equals true.

Check whether the (computed) value of the boolean property showArrow equals true.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.
Whether the property equals true.

Resets all defined child widgets. Override this method in your custom list item renderer and reset all widgets displaying data. Needed as the renderer is used for every row and otherwise data of a different row might be displayed, when not all data displaying widgets are used for the row. Gets called automatically by the {@link qx.ui.mobile.list.provider.Provider}.

Resets the user value of the property selectable.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectable}.

Resets the user value of the property selected.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.

Resets the user value of the property showArrow.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.
New value for property selectable.

Sets the user value of the property selectable.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectable}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property selected.

Sets the user value of the property selected.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property showArrow.

Sets the user value of the property showArrow.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.
The unmodified incoming value.

Toggles the (computed) value of the boolean property selectable.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectable}.
the new value

Toggles the (computed) value of the boolean property selected.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selected}.
the new value

Toggles the (computed) value of the boolean property showArrow.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #showArrow}.
the new value
Whether the row is selectable.
Whether the row is selected.
Whether to show an arrow in the row.
